main event: Observation of 3 large bright objects flying over water toward land in Seaside Park, NJ.
interesting points: The objects showed a steady slow course over water, suggesting they were different from stars or planes. Observers included multiple local policemen, indicating higher credibility of the sightings. The sightings occurred during clear weather with few clouds. There was a significant duration of observation lasting 5-7 minutes, which is atypical for standard astronomical objects. Investigations concluded that while the observation was unusual, there was insufficient data to fully identify the objects.
sighted object: three bright objects in the sky
